Adventure Guildsman:
Pleased to meet you! I'm an information officer from the Adventure Guild. I have news of the world's happenings for those like you. My goal is to aid you in your search for adventures!
I can also help you exchange your Adventurer's Marks and Seals.
Well, time to get started. How can I help you?
